answers.answer: What's the anti-diuretic pill you're taking?What did you want to take the wheatgrass powder for?Of course, it's always best to discuss things like this with your doctor, but we can do some research and see what we come up with.Is your hypothyroidism well controlled?

question: I have hypothyriodism, but that's not my main problem here. I don't know where else to post this. I wanted to take wheatgrass powder. I found out tho, it has a mild diuretic effect to it. I'm taking an anti-diuretic pill now for years because I have a condition called diabetes insipidus (water diabetes), to stop me from going to the bathroom alot. I REALLY wanted to take this wheatgrass powder form, but it seems maybe I shouldnt? Any thoughts?
title: Can I take a diuretic if I take anti diuretic pill?
